seng202.team1.Model.CsvHandling

Class CSVExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team1.Model.CsvHandling.CSVExporter

  • public class CSVExporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Exports a list of DataPoints to a CSV file. These CSV files are able to be (edited and) re-imported into the app. Note that some columns will be blank - these are so that it retains backwards-compatibility with the CSV files that are originally imported.

      • exportBikeTrips

        public static void exportBikeTrips(java.lang.String filename,
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String listName)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the bike trips from the database associated with the user denoted by username and saves them to the file whose name is given by filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to save
        username - Username of the user whose bike trips will be exported
        listName - The name of the list which the bike trips will be exported from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO Exception occurs
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an error with the database
